title: Kimi no na wa
description: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?
actors: Ryûnosuke Kamiki, Mone Kamishiraishi, Ryô Narita, Aoi Yuki

title: Inside Out
description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.
actors: Amy Poehler, Bill Hader, Lewis Black, Mindy Kaling

title: Zootopia
description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.
actors: Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Idris Elba, Jenny Slate

title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
description: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.
actors: Jay Baruchel, Cate Blanchett, Gerard Butler, Craig Ferguson

title: Kubo and the Two Strings
description: A young boy named Kubo must locate a magical suit of armour worn by his late father in order to defeat a vengeful spirit from the past.
actors: Charlize Theron, Art Parkinson, Matthew McConaughey, Ralph Fiennes

title: The Lego Movie
description: An ordinary Lego construction worker, thought to be the prophesied 'Special', is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the Lego universe into eternal stasis.
actors: Chris Pratt, Will Ferrell, Elizabeth Banks, Will Arnett

title: Wreck-It Ralph
description: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.
actors: John C. Reilly, Jack McBrayer, Jane Lynch, Sarah Silverman

title: Big Hero 6
description: The special bond that develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.
actors: Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit, Jamie Chung,T.J. Miller

title: Moana
description: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches an impetuous Chieftain's daughter's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.
actors: Auli'i Cravalho, Dwayne Johnson, Rachel House, Temuera Morrison

title: La tortue rouge
description: A man is shipwrecked on a deserted island and encounters a red turtle, which changes his life.
actors: Emmanuel Garijo, Tom Hudson, Baptiste Goy, Axel Devillers

title: Frozen
description: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister, Anna, teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.
actors: Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Jonathan Groff, Josh Gad

title: Finding Dory
description: The friendly but forgetful blue tang fish, Dory, begins a search for her long-lost parents, and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.
actors: Ellen DeGeneres, Albert Brooks,Ed O'Neill, Kaitlin Olson

title: Despicable Me 2
description: When Gru, the world's most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Gru's own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.
actors: Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Benjamin Bratt, Miranda Cosgrove

title: Monsters University
description: A look at the relationship between Mike and Sulley during their days at Monsters University -- when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.
actors: Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Steve Buscemi, Helen Mirren

title: The Book of Life
description: Manolo, a young man who is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart, embarks on an adventure that spans three fantastic worlds where he must face his greatest fears.
actors: Diego Luna, Zoe Saldana, Channing Tatum, Ron Perlman

title: Sing
description: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists' find that their lives will never be the same.
actors: Matthew McConaughey,Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane, Scarlett Johansson

title: Brave
description: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.
actors: Kelly Macdonald,Billy Connolly, Emma Thompson, Julie Walters

title: Kung Fu Panda 3
description: Continuing his "legendary adventures of awesomeness", Po must face two hugely epic, but different threats: one supernatural and the other a little closer to his home.
actors: Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Dustin Hoffman, Angelina Jolie

title: Storks
description: Storks have moved on from delivering babies to packages. But when an order for a baby appears, the best delivery stork must scramble to fix the error by delivering the baby.
actors: Andy Samberg, Katie Crown,Kelsey Grammer, Jennifer Aniston

title: Rio
description: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.
actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Anne Hathaway, George Lopez,Karen Disher

title: Hotel Transylvania 2
description: Dracula and his friends try to bring out the monster in his half human, half vampire grandson in order to keep Mavis from leaving the hotel.
actors: Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez, Kevin James

title: Home
description: An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.
actors: Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin, Jennifer Lopez

title: The Secret Life of Pets
description: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.
actors: Louis C.K., Eric Stonestreet, Kevin Hart, Lake Bell

title: Trolls
description: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.
actors: Anna Kendrick, Justin Timberlake,Zooey Deschanel, Christopher Mintz-Plasse

title: Minions
description: Minions Stuart, Kevin and Bob are recruited by Scarlet Overkill, a super-villain who, alongside her inventor husband Herb, hatches a plot to take over the world.
actors: Sandra Bullock, Jon Hamm, Michael Keaton, Pierre Coffin

title: Angry Birds
description: Find out why the birds are so angry. When an island populated by happy, flightless birds is visited by mysterious green piggies, it's up to three unlikely outcasts - Red, Chuck and Bomb - to figure out what the pigs are up to.
actors: Jason Sudeikis, Josh Gad, Danny McBride, Maya Rudolph

title: Sausage Party
description: A sausage strives to discover the truth about his existence.
actors: Seth Rogen, Kristen Wiig, Jonah Hill, Alistair Abell

title: Cars 2
description: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.
actors: Owen Wilson, Larry the Cable Guy,Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer

title: Ice Age: Collision Course
description: Manny, Diego, and Sid join up with Buck to fend off a meteor strike that would destroy the world.
actors: Ray Romano, Denis Leary, John Leguizamo, Chris Wedge
